newsitem.title: UK: UK Referendum Party to launch national poster ads.
newsitem.headline: UK Referendum Party to launch national poster ads.

text.p: Britain's Referendum Party, the brainchild of millionaire Sir James Goldsmith, said it will launch its first nationwide poster advertising campaign on Saturday.
Tim Martin, a Referendum Party spokesman, on Thursday said the poster campaign will be "extensive," although he declined to detail the number of sites or the theme.
"There will be two posters," he told Reuters.

The Referendum Party, which Goldsmith previously has said would match or even top general election campaign spending by Britain's leading Conservative and Labour parties, launched its newspaper advertising campaign in October.
Goldsmith's party wants to secure a referendum on whether Britain should adopt closer ties with the European Union.
